hero.title: Healing Minds, Building Hope
hero.subtitle: Mental Health Support in Africa
hero.description: Providing compassionate mental health support and resources to help refugees rebuild their lives across Africa

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Ihumure is a continental initiative dedicated to addressing the mental health challenges of Africans, with a particular focus on Rwanda and refugee populations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To build a mentally resilient and emotionally empowered African population by 2035, ensuring access to mental health care and support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every African feels supported with culturally sensitive and accessible mental health care.

crisis.title: Mental Health Crisis
crisis.description: 50% of refugees in Rwanda face serious mental health challenges based on GHQ-28

depression.title: Depression & Anxiety
depression.description: 20-67% experience depression, with 34.6% reporting anxiety among refugees

impact.title: Continental Impact
impact.description: 15-20% experience depression across Africa, with 10-15% facing anxiety disorders

community.title: Community Approach
community.description: Culturally sensitive care and community-based interventions for improved resilience

awareness.title: Awareness & Stigma Reduction
awareness.description: Umurava Mental Health Awareness campaign reaching 2 million Africans annually.

access.title: Access to Care
access.description: 50 mental health clinics across Africa by 2030 and telehealth services for 2 million users.

trauma.title: Trauma Healing
trauma.description: 6 trauma centers in Rwanda refugee camps & online trauma care for other African regions.

youth.title: Youth Empowerment
youth.description: Mental health education in 1,000 schools, impacting 5 million students.

research.title: Research & Advocacy
research.description: Comprehensive mental health surveys in 20 African countries by 2030.

support.title: Community Support
support.description: Training 50,000 community mental health workers across Africa.

1.quote: Ihumure changed my life. After trauma therapy, I can finally see a future for myself.
1.author: Aisha, Refugee in Rwanda

2.quote: With access to mental health care, I was able to return to school and follow my dreams.
2.author: Emmanuel, Mental Health Beneficiary

3.quote: The community support program gave me the tools to manage my anxiety effectively.
3.author: Grace, Program Participant

donate.title: Donate

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Join our team and make a direct impact in communities.

partner.title: Partner With Us
partner.description: Collaborate with us to expand our reach and impact.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about our programs or want to get involved? Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
